IF...ELSE.body: IF ${1:a==b} THEN	${2:;Your code}ELSE	${3:;Your code}END

CASE...OF.body: CASE ${1:a} OFVALUE ${2:b}	${3:;Your code}VALUE ${4:c}	${5:;Your code}ANY	${6:;Your code}END

SCASE...OF.body: SCASE ${1:a} OFSVALUE ${2:b}	${3:;Your code}SVALUE ${4:c}	${5:;Your code}ANY	${6:;Your code}END

BREAK.description: Suspends the execution of the next program step until the current motion step is completed

SCALL.description: Calls a program with a string variable

MVWAIT.description: Suspends the execution of the next program step until robot is at specified distance or time of the current motion destination

PAUSE.description: Stops program execution. It can be resumed.

HALT.description: Stops program execution. It can NOT be resumed.

JAPPRO.description: Moves to specified distance (mm) of point in TCP's negative Z

LAPPRO.description: Moves to specified distance (mm) of point in TCP's negative Z

JDEPART.description: Moves away from current position a specified distance (mm) in TCP's negative Z

LDEPART.description: Moves away from current position a specified distance (mm) in TCP's negative Z

DRAW.description: Moves linearly from current position in the direction of the base coordinates system

TDRAW.description: Moves linearly from current position in the direction of the tool coordinates system

ALIGN.description: Aligns the Z tool axis parallel to the closest axis of the base coordinate system

XMOVE.description: Move linearly towards point untill condition is met

STABLE.description: Stop robot motion specified time when TCP has reached exactly the previous location

DRIVE.description: Move specified joint axis, a number of degrees, at desired speed

HMOVE.description: Move to point linearly avoiding any singularity

C1MOVE.description: Move in circular motion from point to C1 and to C2

SPEED.description: SPEED X (percentage) / SPEED X MM/S (mm/s) / SPEED X MM/MIN (mm/min) / SPEED X S (s)

BRAKE.description: Stops robot motion immediately and program execution skips to the next step
